page.title: 18Ancient Monuments:C.Turner
page.content: The Tumuli near our school are on the land owned by Boconnoc Estate and are in the district of Caradon and the Parish of Braddock. The land is used for grazing,crops and some is scrub. The Tumuli were built in the Bronze Age.The height of the Tumuli varies from 2 _ 25 feet.The diameter varies from 25 _ 110 yards. Some of the Tumuli is covered with gorse bushes and some with long grass. The Tumuli have sometimes got quartz stones on the sides. The Tumuli are protected by the Dept. of the Environment and cannot be knocked down by the farmers. Some of the Tumuli have flat tops instead of rounded ones and some people say they were opened up in the Civil War and more dead bodies were put in.
